title: 征文竞赛
content:
[[=]]
+* [[span style="font-size:120%"]]欢迎来到SCP基金会征文竞赛列表![[/span]]
[[/=]]

在此，您能找到过去几年在SCP基金会网站上举行的所有竞赛的归档列表。[[footnote]]除了[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/2019goi%E7%AB%9E%E8%B5%9B#pages 2019年国际站GoI竞赛]之外，它主要在国际翻译站上举办。更多信息**[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/international-goi-contest-2019 见此]**。[[/footnote]]本页同样列出了每次竞赛的获胜者、概念或主题、奖励、主办人，以及其他的相关信息。为方便起见，每个竞赛条目边上也附有指向其各自中心页的链接。

[[footnoteblock]]

[[ul class="modal-wrapper"]][[li class="folded"]]
[[toc]]
[[div_ class="foldable-list-container chrono"]]
[# 按时间顺序][[/div]]
[[div_ class="foldable-list-container latest"]]
[# 按最新排序][[/div]]
[[div class="item-list"]]

+ 2009 - 2012
[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[gears-birthday-contest-2009|2009年Gears生日竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Dr Gears]] || 2009/8/07 - 2009/8/19 ||
-----
为了庆祝Dr Gears（用户，而非角色）的生日，一个以恐怖为大致主题的竞赛举办了。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[opportunity-knocks|]]]，[[*user tunedtoadeadchannel]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[the-great-short-story-contest-archives|杰出短篇小说竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user agatharights]] || [[[archived:the-great-short-story-contest|2010/1/27 - 2010/9/30]]] ||
-----
多个短篇竞赛，每个都有简短的挑战主题。

= **获胜者：**
= 多人（见中心页）
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[scp1000contesthub|SCP-1000竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| SCP Wiki工作人员 || 2011/7/27 - 2011/9/01 ||
-----
一场决定哪个SCP将取得令人垂涎的SCP-1000编号的竞赛，主题是民间故事和都市传说。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[scp-1000|SCP-1000]]] - 大脚怪，[[*user thedeadlymoose]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[halloween-contest|2012年万圣节竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user TroyL]] || 2012/10/21 - 2012/10/31 ||
-----
将SCP基金会和宇宙内的万圣节以某种形式整合起来的故事竞赛。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[treats|]]]，[[*user Dr Gears]]
[[/div]]

+ 2013 - 2014
[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[new-years-contest|2013年新年设定竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user TroyL]] || 2013/1/11 - 2013/2/15 ||
-----
旨在创造某个新设定的竞赛，其中诞生了多个至今仍在网站上深受欢迎的设定。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[unfounded-hub|未建立 设定]]]，by [[*user DrClef]]、[[*user Fantem]]、[[*user Photosynthetic]]，& [[*user Pig_Catapult]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[five-questions|五提问竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user DrEverettMann]] || 2013/2/25 - 2013/3/22||
-----
竞赛提出了五个问题，每个问题都与另一篇文章中的留白或情节漏洞有关。作者需要写作故事以回答上述问题。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[iteration-0|]]]，[[*user HammerMaiden]]
= [[[playing-god|]]]，[[*user  Rikks]]
= [[[children-of-doubt|]]]，[佚名]
= [[[a-slumber-did-my-spirit-seal|]]]，[[*user Dmatix]]
= [[[bugs|]]]，[[*user Giant Enemy Spycrab]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[time-contest|时间竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Drewbear]] || 2013/8/01 - 2013/9/07 ||
-----
围绕现有SCP将如何与时间的流逝互动而开展的竞赛。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[and-the-winner-is|]]]，[[*user Smapti]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[scp2000contesthub|SCP-2000竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| SCP Wiki工作人员 || 2013/10/28 - 2013/12/13 ||
-----
一场以令人垂涎的SCP-2000编号为奖品的竞赛，主题概念是科幻。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[scp-2000|SCP-2000]]] - 机械降神，[[*user HammerMaiden]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[under-appreciated-contest|被埋没竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user CryogenChaos]] || 2014/3/07 - 2014/4/11 ||
-----
一场用故事将人们的视线拉回一些不幸被忽视的文章上的竞赛。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[Exit History|]]]，[[*user HammerMaiden]]
= [[[Exploded Diagram of a Young Woman]]]，[[*user Chubert]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[goi-contest-2014|相关组织竞赛！]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user TroyL]] || 2014/5/28 - 2014/7/12 ||
-----
我们最出名的几个关注组织都起源于这场团队竞赛，作者们组队合作，为SCP宇宙创造了更多的玩家。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[serpent-s-hand-hub|蛇之手]]]，by [[*user thedeadlymoose]]，[[*user Dexanote]]，[[*user Vivax]]，& [[*user Zyn]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[dystopia-contest|反乌托邦竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Rejekyll]] || 2014/10/29 - 2014/12/07 ||
-----
反乌托邦简介。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[Mission Statement|]]]，[[*user Dr Reach]]
[[/div]]

+ 2015 - 2016
[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[reimagining-contest|重新想象竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user thedeadlymoose]] & [[*user TroyL]] || 2015/2/03 - 2015/3/10 ||
-----
在这场竞赛中，网站上最古老、最经典的几篇文章得以为新的受众翻新与重新想象。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[lucky-dinosaur|]]]，[[*user Sophia Light]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[short-works-contest|短文竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Sophia Light]] || 2015/7/04 - 2015/8/02 ||
-----
言贵简洁——而本竞赛即是为了以最少的言辞创造出最棒的文章。
= **获胜者：**
= [[[scp-2521|●●|●●●●●|●●|●]]]，[[*user LurkD]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[mobile-task-force-contest|机动特遣队竞赛！]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Decibelles]] & [[*user TroyL]] || 2016/1/13 - 2016/3/16 ||
-----
这场竞赛的主角是基金会的MTF们，身着制服的最优秀人才。

= **获胜者：**
= **Team Basic ("Kappa-10")**，by [[*user LurkD]]，[[*user djkaktus]]，Harmony，& [[*user Doctor Cimmerian]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[an-incredibly-important-announcement|沙雕小说竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user TroyL]] || 2016/3/31 - 2016/4/01 ||
-----
作者们的任务是要创作……一些东西，行吧！

= **获胜者：**
= [[[gears-is-totally-not-a-robot-guys|]]]，[[*user Dr Solo]]
= [[[the-minions-day-at-the-scp|]]]，[[*user Randomini]]
= [[[its-not-pronounced-like-the-thesaurus-dammit|]]]，[[*user Kestin]]
= [[[scp-the-anime-part-4-gears-iceberg-clef-kondraki-rights-ligh|]]]，[[*user MrWrong]]
= [[[orgy-5-counsel-9|]]]，[[*user TyGently]]
= [[[my-loever-the-dog|]]]，[[*user Zmax15]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[d-class-contest|D级竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Decibelles]] & [[*user Dexanote]] || 2016/09/11 - 2016/10/01 ||
-----
作者们需要为那些实验记录和探索记录中无处不在的橙色连体衣赋予全新的视角。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-2439]]]，[[*user Jack Ike]]
= [[[SCP-2669]]]，[[*user Kalinin]]
= [[[history|]]]，[[*user Humanmale]]
[[/div]]

+ 2017 - 2018
[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[history-contest|这个竞赛是历史！]]]
[[/div]]
|| Harmony || 2017/1/03 - 2017/2/06 ||
-----
有关这世界浩瀚历史的SCP与故事。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-2624]]]，[[*user TyGently]]
= [[[now-hollow-fires-burn-out-to-black-and-lights-are-waning-low|]]]，[[*user Doctor Cimmerian]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[scp3000contesthub|SCP-3000竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| SCP管理团队 || 2017/3/05 - 2017/4/20 ||
-----
为令人垂涎的SCP-3000编号举办的竞赛，而主题即是SCP网站最为声名昭著的题材：恐怖！

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-3000]]] - 阿难陀舍沙，by [[*user A Random Day]]，[[*user djkaktus]]，& [[*user Joreth]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[173-festival|十周年庆 SCParty]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Dexanote]] || 2017/6/08 - 2017/6/19 ||
-----
自SCP-173的发布已过了十年，整个网站通过各种各样有关那座雕像的文章来为它的最初之作庆生。

= **获胜者：**
= 全体参赛者
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[social-media-art-contest|社交媒体艺术竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| 网络外联 || 2017/7/18 - 2017/8/30 ||
-----
首届艺术竞赛，展现SCP社群全部精彩的视觉创意。

= **获胜者：**
= 多人
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[72-hour-jam-contest|72小时连写竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & [[*user A Random Day]] || 2018/2/17 - 2018/2/27 ||
-----
作者们的任务是要连续三天在24小时内创作并发布三篇文章，分别符合三个惊人的主题。时钟滴答。

= **获胜者：**
= [[*user Rimple]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[doomsday-contest|末日竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & [[*user A Random Day]] || 2018/04/21 - 2018/06/15 ||
-----
SCP世界已经在过去的几年里极大地发展了——因此在这次竞赛中，作者们将组队研究如何以最华丽盛大的方式将其摧毁。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[apotheosis-hub|Clever Gentlemen队]]] - [[*user Weryllium]]，[[*user CadaverCommander]]，[[*user Modern_Erasmus]]，& [[*user fieldstone]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[scp4000contesthub|SCP-4000竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| SCP管理团队 || 2018/06/20 - 2018/08/08 ||
-----
竞争SCP-4000编号的竞赛，系列五的开启，一切归于历史。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[taboo|禁忌之地]]]，[[*user PeppersGhost]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[halloween-contest-2018|2018年万圣节竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Dexanote]] || 2018/9/30 - 2018/10/30 ||
-----
一个季节性竞赛，以全部的剧情套路和陈腔滥调庆祝最恐怖的节日。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[mtf-sigma-5-pumpkin-punchers|MTF Sigma-5 “南瓜拳士”]]]，[[*user Rounderhouse]]
[[/div]]

+ 2019 - 2020
[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[cliche-con-2019|2019年老掉牙竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| taylor_itkin & [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] || 2018/12/14 - 2019/2/15 ||
-----
SCP作者们被给予一列网站上最常见的老掉牙主题，并鼓励他们颠覆它们——或者选择直接将它们贯彻到底。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-4205]]]，[[*user Woedenaz]]
= [[[SCP-3597]]]，[[*user aismallard]]
= [[[SCP-4511]]]，[[*user DrAnnoyingDog]] & [[*user Rounderhouse]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[144-hour-jam-contest|144小时连写竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & [[*user A Random Day]] || 2019/3/09 - 2019/3/29 ||
-----
连写竞赛的胜利凯旋，每个主题的写作时间翻倍至48小时，写作有关长毛狗、垃圾小说和大梦一场的主题。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-4808]]]，[[[SCP-4804]]]，& [[[not-a-seagull-proposal|]]]，[[*user notgull]]
= [[[SCP-4290]]]，[[[barrels-of-prose| ]]]，& [[[sweeter-dreams-inc|]]]，[[*user NatVoltaic]]
= [[[SCP-4464]]]，[[[SCP-4494]]]，& [[[SCP-4744]]]，[[*user Mortos]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[collaboration-contest|合著竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & [[*user A Random Day]] || 2019/6/10 - 2019/7/16 ||
-----
合著写作可能会很困难，但这个双人竞赛展现了良好的合作究竟能有多么成果丰硕。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[Land Of Honey]]] & [[[SCP-4475]]]，KindlyTurtleClem & [[*user Lt Flops]]
= [[[SCP-4688]]] & [[[erics-journal|Eric's Journal]]]，[[*user notgull]]与[[*user Mew-ltiverse]]
= [[[chicago-factory|CARROLL 280号：私酒运输桶/芝加哥鬼灵的再订购（R-01221）]]] & [[[SCP-4256]]]，[[*user Ihp]] & [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[scp5000contesthub|SCP-5000竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] || 2019/12/15 - 2020/02/01 ||
-----
为SCP-5000编号举办的竞赛——主题是那神秘的谜题。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-5000]]] - 为什么？，[[*user Tanhony]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[144-hour-jam-contest-two|144小时连写竞赛2]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & [[*user A Random Day]] || 2020/3/09 - 2020/3/29 ||
-----
第三届连写竞赛，主题是“爆炸”、“美味”，以及“不只眼前所见”。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-5983]]]，[[[adoption-poster-pearl |]]]，& [[[SCP-5149]]]，[[*user Rounderhouse]]
= [[[cool-guys-dont-look-at-explosions |]]]，[[[project-proposal-2018-145 |]]]，& [[[SCP-5047]]]，[[*user Uncle Nicolini]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[exquisite-corpse-contest|拼尸竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & [[*user A Random Day]] || 2020/5/01 - 2020/6/29 ||
-----
每位作者都收到了分配至各自的收容措施和项目等级，并要求写出他们能想到的最棒的文章，其间对自己的合著者一无所知。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-5250]]]，by Popsioak & [[*user Dyslexion]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[canon-renaissance-contest|设定复兴竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Modulum]] & [[*user ProcyonLotor]] || 2020/8/27 - 2020/10/29 ||
-----
许多自首届设定竞赛中产生的设定都寂寂沉眠了——而这场竞赛使它们重获新生，跟上了时代的潮流。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[the-man-in-the-white-suit-hub|白衣人]]]，by [[*user Rounderhouse]]，[[*user Captain Kirby]]，[[*user Tufto]]，& [[*user Woedenaz]]
[[/div]]

+ 2021 - 2022
[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[cupid-contest-2021|2021丘比特竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & taylor_itkin || 2021/2/7 - 2021/2/28 ||
-----
爱意盈空。不妨记录下心旌的摇动。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-5659]]]，[[*user Ralliston]]
= [[[skyisover-thiscruelmoon-weintertwined|]]]，[[*user The_Spider_Queen]]
= [[[critter-profile-max|]]]，[[*user R4_EX]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[jam-con-2021|2021连写竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & taylor_itkin || 2021/03/22 - 2021/04/01 ||
-----
连写竞赛。四度开花！“海生”、“腐败”，以及“可能会出什么问题呢？”。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-5929]]]，[[[SCP-5383]]]，& [[[SCP-5377]]]，[[*user Rounderhouse]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[scp6000contesthub|SCP-6000竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user ProcyonLotor]] & taylor_itkin || 2021/4/25 - 2021/7/02 ||
-----
为SCP-6000编号举办的竞赛，与自然的步调协调。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-6000]]] - 毒蛇，驼鹿，与被放逐者之图书馆，[[*user Rounderhouse]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item unofficial"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[memecon-unofficial|梗竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Woedenaz]] || 2021/6/11 - 2021/7/22 ||
-----
一场非官方竞赛，旨在通过玩弄我们最爱的梗，将一点点幽默重新注入网站之中。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-6599]]]，[[*user J Dune]] & [[*user PlaguePJP]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item unofficial"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[nightmarefest|梦魇节]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user UraniumEmpire]] || 2021/9/24 - 2021/11/13 ||
-----
非官方节日活动，以三个同等恐怖的主题来嘉奖最令人毛骨悚然的文章。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-6274]]]，[[*user Rounderhouse]]
= [[[SCP-6061]]]，[[*user Ecronak]]
= [[[SCP-6502]]]，[[*user bigslothonmyface]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[department-contest|2022部门竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Rounderhouse]] || 2022/1/21 - 2022/3/31 ||
-----
基金会有很多部门和科室，在聚光灯外艰苦工作，用他们专业的知识和特殊的技能让异常保持收容。该竞赛旨在关注基金会中较少为人所知的部门。

= **获胜者：**
= **Marge在设定上不会放屁队（遏火部）**，队员[[*user Uncle Nicolini]], [[*user UraniumEmpire]], & [[*user T Rutherford]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[scp7000contesthub|SCP-7000竞赛]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user WhiteGuard]] & [[*user Naepic]] || 2022/6/26 - 2022/8/29 ||
-----
为SCP-7000编号举办的竞赛，这回被赋予了相当“好运”的主题。

= **获胜者：**
= [[[SCP-7000]]] - 大冤种，[[*user HarryBlank]]
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[halloween-con-2022|]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]、[[*user Dexanote]]、[[*user Agent Whitney]] || 2022/9/30 - 2022/10/31 ||
-----
一场散文与艺作竞赛，主题是这网站大概最喜欢的节日：万圣节！

= **获胜者：**
= **[[[makeup|化妆]]]** by [[*user J Dune]]（写作区）
= 以及
= **[[[art:happy-halloween2022|]]]** by [[*user Ironshears]]（艺作区）
[[/div]]

+ 2023 - 2024
[!-- ======================================= --]
[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[ColdpostCon|]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Modulum]]、[[*user Naepic]]、[[*user Whiteguard]] || 2023/1/2 - 2023/1/12 ||
-----
冬季征文，主题为不接受任何外部评论的速写！

= **获胜者：**
= **[[[SCP-7311]]]** by [[*user Rounderhouse]]（SCP分类）
= 以及
= **[[[The Nuclear Option|]]]** by [[*user Captain Kirby]]（非SCP分类）
[[/div]]

[[div class="item unofficial"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[RomCon]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user Uraniumempire]] || 2023/5/8 - 2023/7/18 ||
-----
浪漫主题的单淘汰制原创角色锦标赛！
= **获胜者：**
= **[[[agent-calendars-hot-date-1|Agent Calendar's Hot Date]]]**, **[[[agent-calendars-hot-date-2|Agent Calendar's Hot Date 2]]]**, & **[[[undervegas-hub|]]]** by [[*user Rounderhouse]] 
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]

[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[GoblinCon|]]]
[[/div]]
|| [[*user stormbreath]], [[*user Modulum]], [[*user Naepic]], [[*user Whiteguard]] || 2023/5/12 - 2023/6/16 ||
-----
一场以填补先前被技术问题封锁的SCP编号为主题的竞赛，这些编号内部称作“哥布林编号”。

= **获胜者：**
= **[[[SCP-3775]]]** by [[*user Kothardarastrix]]（76级）
= **[[[SCP-5257]]]** by [[*user Doctor Cimmerian]]与[[*user EmotionalEntropy]]（故障）
= **[[[SCP-6467]]]** by [[*user uncle Nicolini]]、[[*user Rakkran]]与[[*user fairydoctor]]（奇幻哥布林）
= **[[[SCP-6109]]]** by [[*user FLOORBOARDS]]（大逃杀）
= 以及 
= **[[[SCP-6183]]]** by [[*user billith]]、[[*user MontagueETC]]与[[*user liryn]]（删除）
[[/div]]

[!-- ======================================= --]

[[div class="item"]]
[[div class="item-title"]]
[[[remixcon2023 |]]]
[[/div]]
||[[*user Uncle Nicolini]], [[*user Modulum]] and [[*user Naepic]] || 2023/8/4 - 2023/9/11 ||
-----
与2015重新想象竞赛类似，该竞赛的主题是重混旧的/新的/任何SCP文章！
= **获胜者：**
= **[[[SCP-7918]]]** by [[*user Long Arm Larry]]（SCP组）
= **[[[she-s-worth-it-i-promise | she’s worth it, i promise]]]** by [[*user LoveMarginal]]（故事组）
= **[[[critter-profile-cack-dealer | Critter Profile: CACK Dealer!]]]** by [[*user harmacy]]（GoI格式组）
= **[[[art:hand-drawn-cassy |]]]** by [[*user Raddagher]]（艺术组）
= 以及
= **[[[secure-facility-dossier-site-387 |]]]** by [[*user Anky swallow]]（其他类别）
[[/div]]

[!-- 这是原页面的CSS设置。 --]
[[module CSS]]
.content-panel .content-type-title > p {
  margin: 0;
}
.content-panel .content-type-title {
  font-size: 150%;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding: 5px 20px;
  background-color: #666;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0;
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,.8),
    inset 0 15px 1px rgba(255,255,255,.2),
    inset 0 15px 10px rgba(255,255,255,.2);
}
.content-panel .content-type-description {
padding: 0 20px;
text-align: justify;
}
.content-panel.content-row .content-type-description {
padding: 5px 2px;
}
.content-panel.content-row .content-type-description-2 {
padding: 0 2px;
text-align: justify;
}
[[/module]]

































































[!-- 下有CSS。你已经得到警告了。 --]
























[[module CSS]]
#page-title {
    text-align: center;
}
.footnotes-footer .title { font-size: 1.15em; margin: 0.3em 0; }
.footnotes-footer .footnote-footer { font-size: 0.95em; }

.modal-wrapper {
    list-style: none;
    display: contents;
}
.modal-wrapper > li .foldable-list-container {
    text-align: right;
    font-size: 90%;
}
.modal-wrapper > li.folded .foldable-list-container.chrono { display: none; }
.modal-wrapper > li.unfolded .foldable-list-container.latest { display: none; }

.modal-wrapper > li > .item-list,
.modal-wrapper > li #toc-list {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: column;
}
.modal-wrapper > li.unfolded > .item-list,
.modal-wrapper > li.unfolded #toc-list {
    flex-flow: column-reverse;
}

.item-list h1 span, .item-title a {
    word-break: initial !important;
}
p[style="text-align: center;"] { margin: 0.625em 0; }

.item-list h1 {
    width: 7ch;
    margin: -1.5rem 0 1.5rem;
    height: 0rem;
    font-size: 1.5em;
    line-height: 1;
    position: relative;
}
li.unfolded .item-list h1 { margin: -5rem 0 5rem; }

.item-list h1 span {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -3.625rem;
}

.item-list h1 span::after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    border: solid 0.3rem currentColor;
    border-radius: 50%;
    width: 1.15rem;
    height: 1.15rem;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0.25rem auto 0 0.85rem;
}
.item-list h1 span::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    background-color: currentColor;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    width: 6rem;
    height: 0.25rem;
    margin: -0.7rem auto 0 0;
    bottom: 0.45rem;
    left: 1.85rem;
}

.item {
  background-color: #FFFFFF;
  border: 1px solid #bbb;
  margin: 1.25rem;
  margin-left: 5.15rem;
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  position: relative;
}
.item .item-title {
  position: relative;
  top: -2rem;
  left: -3rem;
  background-color: inherit;
  border: 1px solid #bbb;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  max-width: max-content!important;
  margin-bottom: -3.25rem;
}
.item .item-title p {
  margin: 0.1rem 0.5rem;
}

.item.unofficial {
    background-color: #FFF4E4;
}
.item.unofficial::before {
    content: "非官方";
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    display: block;
    padding: 0.25rem 0.45rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 1.05em;
}

.item > hr {
    margin: 0.5rem -2.05rem;
    background-color: transparent;
    height: 0;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #bbb;
}

.item > table { width: 97.5%; }
.item > table.wiki-content-table tr {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
}
.item > table.wiki-content-table td {
    text-align: center;
    border: none;
    flex-basis: 9rem;
    flex-grow: 1;
}
.item > table.wiki-content-table td::before {
    font-size: 0.95em;
    font-weight: bold;
    display: block;
}
.item > table.wiki-content-table td:first-child::before { content: "主办人： "; }
.item > table.wiki-content-table td:last-child::before { content: "竞赛时间："; }

@media only screen and (max-width: 660px) {
    .item { margin: 1.25rem 0.25rem; }
    .item-list h1 {
        width: max-content;
        margin: 0.5rem auto 0;
        height: auto;
        font-size: 2em;
    }
    .item-list h1 span {
        position: relative;
        bottom: 0;
        top: 0.125em;
    }
    .item-list h1 span::after {
          margin: 0.45rem auto;
          width: 0;
          height: 0;
          border-radius: 0;
          border: solid 0.75rem currentColor;
          border-bottom-width: 0;
          border-left-color: transparent;
          border-right-color: transparent;
    }
    .item-list h1 span::before { display: none; }
    li.unfolded .item-list h1 { margin: -1rem auto 1.25rem; }
    li.unfolded .item-list h1 span {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column-reverse;
    }
    li.unfolded .item-list h1 span::after {
          border-top-width: 0;
          border-bottom-width: 0.75rem;
          border-left-color: transparent;
          border-right-color: transparent;
    }
}
[[/module]]
